headline: Opinion Georgias primary turnout shows Bidens falsehoods
author: Marc A. Thiessen
sentences: It mandated the use of drop boxes for the first time and expanded the forms of acceptable voter identification to include a utility bill, bank statement, government check or paycheck, or even the last four digits of the voters Social Security number.
